description: This file defines the AppEnv class, which provides accessors for environment variables with default values, using the flutter_dotenv package to manage environment configurations in a Flutter application.

classes.name: AppEnv
classes.description: A class that provides static getters to access environment variables such as API base URL, API timeout, and theme name with default fallbacks.

methods.name: apiBaseUrl
methods.description: Returns the API base URL from environment variables or a default URL if not set.

methods.name: apiTimeoutMs
methods.description: Returns the API timeout in milliseconds from environment variables or a default value if not set.

methods.name: themeName
methods.description: Returns the theme name from environment variables or a default theme name if not set.
